      • loadCopyBook

        ExternalRecord loadCopyBook(java.io.InputStream inputStream,
                          java.lang.String copyBookName,
                          int splitCopybook,
                          int dbIdx,
                          java.lang.String font,
                          int copybookFormat,
                          int binaryFormat,
                          int systemId,
                          AbsSSLogger log)
                            throws java.io.IOException
        Insert a XML Dom Copybook into the Copybook DB
        Parameters:
        copyBookName - Copy Book file Name
        splitCopybook - wether to split a copy book on a redefine / 01
        dbIdx - Database Index
        font - font name to use
        copybookFormat - format of the copybook; see cb2xmlConstants
        binaryFormat - binary format to use
        systemId - System Identifier
        log - log where any messages should be written
        Returns:
        return the record that has been read in
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
